revised_title: Growth and Reproduction in the Stoat (Mustela erminea)
tldr: This study examines the reproductive processes and growth of the stoat (Mustela erminea). The research focuses on the general morphology of the reproductive organs, the reproductive cycle, and the histological changes in the male and female reproductive organs. The findings provide insights into the breeding season, fertility, pregnancy, litter size, and lactation in stoats, contributing to the understanding of the reproductive biology of this species.
